title: Grandma's Apple Crisp
instructions:
1. Preheat the oven to 350 F. If youre like me and dont have a microwave, this is a great time to put the margarine in the oven to melt (in a heat proof container).
  2. Mix together the apples, cinnamon, salt, water, and lemon juice. Place this mixture in a lightly oiled 10 x 6-inch baking dish or a round pie pan. Next, mix the melted margarine with the flour, sugar, and salt until thoroughly combined. Crumble this evenly on top of the apples.
  3. Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the topping is nicely browned and crisp. This is best served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream (non dairy if desired.)

steps.step: Preheat the oven to 350 F. If youre like me and dont have a microwave, this is a great time to put the margarine in the oven to melt (in a heat proof container).
Mix together the apples, cinnamon, salt, water, and lemon juice.

Place this mixture in a lightly oiled 10 x 6-inch baking dish or a round pie pan. Next, mix the melted margarine with the flour, sugar, and salt until thoroughly combined. Crumble this evenly on top of the apples.
Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until the topping is nicely browned and crisp. This is best served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream (non dairy if desired.)
